doc.field: New York State National Guard, 32nd Infantry Regiment vouchers
New York State National Guard, 32nd Infantry Regiment vouchers

This collection consists of 1877 vouchers issued by the 32nd Infantry Regiment of the New York State National Guard to deliver helmets and fatigue caps from J.C.F. Deecken of New York City to various members.

This collection consists of 1877 vouchers issued by the 32nd Infantry Regiment of the New York State National Guard to deliver helmets and fatigue caps from J.C.F. Deecken of New York City to various members.

This collection consists of vouchers issued by the 32nd Infantry Regiment of the New York State National Guard to deliver helmets and fatigue caps from J.C.F. Deecken of New York City to various members. The documents are dated 1877. The 32nd Regiment was headquartered in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, N.Y.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1977.
